author: Lon.TV
description:
The time is here - it's time to save free TV as we know it! The FCC has heard the thousands of request from consumers about DRM restrictions and wants your ideas for how to address this problem. You have until May 6  to tell them. In this video I'll guide you through the process. See more in this series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:12 - What the FCC is Seeking Comment About
03:34 - Deadlines
04:02 - Submission Tip: Just the Facts!!
06:00 - How to File: Express Comment
07:26 - How to File: Long Form Comment
08:27 - Confirmation of Submittal
09:11 - Conclusion

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

title: FCC Opens Public Comment Period for ATSC 3 / Nextgen TV - How to Get Your Voice Heard!
